item.title: Some festivals welcome audiences in hundreds of thousands, others just the hundreds. Both equally as nice but at Krankenhaus you can bring your dog 🐶😉!
item.dc:creator: @AerialFestival
item.description: Some festivals welcome audiences in hundreds of thousands, others just the hundreds. Both equally as nice but at Krankenhaus you can bring your dog 🐶😉!

item.title: ✨Mega-magical micro festival✨ In partnership with @SeaPowerBand we present KRANKENHAUS FESTIVAL. 26-29 Aug 2022, Muncaster Castle, West Cumbria. ⁣ Weekend ticket £150 👉 http://www.krankenhausfestival.com
item.dc:creator: @AerialFestival
item.description:

In partnership with @SeaPowerBand we present KRANKENHAUS FESTIVAL. 26-29 Aug 2022, Muncaster Castle, West Cumbria. ⁣

item.title: Thank you @Hayden_Thorpe @lonetaxidermist @djgripper @jackvwmcneill >@GP_LakesDales @BreweryKendal & the many others who helped create a wonderful celebration of Cumbrian talent. More coming soon from Aerial. Stay tuned.
item.dc:creator: @AerialFestival

item.title:
RT by @AerialFestival: Fantastic shots by @alexcropper from @Hayden_Thorpe X @AerialFestival on Saturday!
So many talented artists and fantastic performances, we loved it!
See our upcoming gigs: http://bit.ly/2Fa4Zwu
#BreweryArtsMusic #Kendal #Music

item.title: Aerial is a festival of new work inspired by Cumbria. Join us in Kendal on Sat 9th Oct for a one-off event featuring exclusive performances, film, music and more. Tickets £15 👉 https://bit.ly/3li7bTQ
item.dc:creator: @AerialFestival

item.title: RT by @AerialFestival: In association with @AerialFestival who commissioned the Aerial Songs EP, I’ll be at Brewery Arts, Kendal on 9th October. It’s fitting to start in the very environment that has long inspired my work. Tickets via https://smarturl.it/HaydenThorpeKendal

item.title: RT by @AerialFestival: V much looking forward to this! To get in the right splashy mood, how about limbering up with this #swimlit discussion recorded for @AerialFestival last year, with new work from @ejbpoetry @ninamingya and @jessicajlee: https://aerialfestival.com/words-water/

item.title: The wonderful @tweetbytheriver are releasing the magical ‘Rydalwater’ by @m0dernnature, originally commissioned for CBTR @AerialFestival, as a ltd 7" for #BandcampFriday. 'Rydalwater’ is inspired by Jack Cooper's childhood visits to the Lakes. Listen/buy: https://modernnature.bandcamp.com/album/rydalwater
item.dc:creator: @AerialFestival
item.description:

modernnature.bandcamp.com/al…

item.title: RT by @AerialFestival: As part of their 2020 festival, @AerialFestival commissioned their Kendal-born artist-in-residence Hayden Thorpe to develop new music inspired by the Lake District. Head over to http://www.aerialfestival.com to listen and to discover more incredible artists. #aerialfestival #newmusic
item.dc:creator: @GP_LakesDales
item.description: As part of their 2020 festival, @AerialFestival commissioned their Kendal-born artist-in-residence Hayden Thorpe to develop new music inspired by the Lake District. Head over to aerialfestival.com to listen and to discover more incredible artists. #aerialfestival #newmusic
